Cached Semantic Maps: An Introduction

Right, I know what you’re thinking. Cached Semantic Maps? Pfft, sounds pretentious. And you know what? I agree. I don’t think this is a data structure that has many practical benefits. But I think it’s a cool idea, and no amount of practicality is going to stand in my way
